title: Colcannon Quesadillas
directions: In a bowl, combine the potatoes, spinach, scallions, and salt and pepper to taste. Mix well to combine. Heat the mixture in a skillet on top of the stove or in the microwave.
Divide the mixture evenly over half of each of the tortillas. Fold the tortillas over and press down lightly.

Place 1 or 2 of the quesadillas in a large non-stick skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. Cook until lightly browned on both sides, turning once. Keep warm while you cook the remaining quesadillas in the same way. Cut the quesadillas into wedges and serve with desired sauce.
ingredients: 3/4 cup tightly-packed cooked and well drained spinach, kale, cabbage or chard, chopped
Choice of green sauce: mint chutney; picante sauce; green Tabasco sauce
